comments:
using 0.7-RC3 adding the folowing items to .wtpmodules does not cause the jars
to be copied to destination directory:

<dependent-module deploy-path="/WEB-INF/lib"
  handle="module:/classpath/lib/dlib/ext/asm-1.4.3.jar">
  <dependency-type>uses</dependency-type>
</dependent-module>
<dependent-module deploy-path="/WEB-INF/lib"
 
handle="module:/classpath/lib/home/rafal/.maven/repository/asm/jars/asm-1.4.3.jar">
  <dependency-type>uses</dependency-type>
</dependent-module>

the corresponding, correctly working .classpath entries look as following:

<classpathentry kind="lib" path="/dlib/ext/asm-1.4.3.jar"/>
<classpathentry kind="lib"
path="/home/rafal/.maven/repository/asm/jars/asm-1.4.3.jar"/>

The first one is w workspace jar from another project, the second is external jar.

I spotted the following in the error log:
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at
org.eclipse.wst.common.componentcore.internal.StructureEdit.isLocalDependency(StructureEdit.java:849)
	at
org.eclipse.wst.common.componentcore.internal.builder.ProjectComponentsBuilderDataModelProvider.computeModuleBuildOrder(ProjectComponentsBuilderDataModelProvider.java:153)
	at
org.eclipse.wst.common.componentcore.internal.builder.ProjectComponentsBuilderDataModelProvider.computeModuleBuildOrder(ProjectComponentsBuilderDataModelProvider.java:189)
	at
org.eclipse.wst.common.componentcore.internal.builder.ProjectComponentsBuilderDataModelProvider.populateFullModuleBuilderDataModelList(ProjectComponentsBuilderDataModelProvider.java:210)
	at
org.eclipse.wst.common.componentcore.internal.builder.ProjectComponentsBuilderDataModelProvider.populateModuleBuilderDataModelList(ProjectComponentsBuilderDataModelProvider.java:88)
	at
org.eclipse.wst.common.componentcore.internal.builder.ProjectComponentsBuilderDataModelProvider.propertySet(ProjectComponentsBuilderDataModelProvider.java:66)
	at
org.eclipse.wst.common.frameworks.internal.datamodel.DataModelImpl.internalSetProperty(DataModelImpl.java:178)
	at
org.eclipse.wst.common.frameworks.internal.datamodel.DataModelImpl.setProperty(DataModelImpl.java:168)
	at
org.eclipse.wst.common.componentcore.internal.builder.ComponentStructuralBuilder.build(ComponentStructuralBuilder.java:79)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.events.BuildManager$2.run(BuildManager.java:593)

You should not need to update the .wtpmodules file directly.  There is now a
property sheet page on component projects for setting up module dependencies. 
Right click on project->J2EE Module Dependencies.  You should be able to set up
the web lib jars there.

This will be covered by functional tests written for that properties page.

I did also add the null guards to the structure edit.

This is fixed for the 0818 WTP Integration build for M8.

This bug was moved to 'closed' state, since it is so old and it is assumed really fixed and no longer useful or need further attention. Feel free to re-open, or open a new bug, if this semi-automatic processing was done in error.
